00022         function produceOutput($question,$color,$prime) {
00023                 $a = rand() % 10; // generates the random number
00024                 $b = rand() % 10; // generates the random number
00025                 $code = MathGuard :: generateCode($a, $b, $prime);
00026 
00027                 // please don't remove the backlink, thank you
00028                 $output = '<a href="http://www.codegravity.com/">MathGuard</a> '.$question.
00029                 '<table border="0">
00030                         <tr>
00031                                 <td>
00032                                         <pre style="font-size:'.SIZE.'px;font-weight:bold;color:'.$color.';padding:0px;margin:0px;line-height:'.LINEHEIGHT.'px;">'.MathGuard::renderExpression($a,$b).'</pre>
00033                                 </td>
00034                                 <td>
00035                                         <input type="text" style="width:20px;" name="mathguard_answer" maxlength="2"/>
00036                                         <input type="hidden" name="mathguard_code" value="'.$code.'" />
00037                                 </td>
00038                         </tr>
00039                 </table>';
00040 
00041 
00042                 return $output;
00043         }

00048         function decToBin($dec) {
00049                 $pattern = "123456789ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRTSTUWXYZ"; //without zero, it was interpreted as an empty space
00050                 $output = "   ";
00051                 $i = 0;
00052                 do {
00053                         if ($dec % 2) {
00054                                 $rand = rand() % 34;
00055                                 $output {
00056                                         2 - $i }
00057                                         = $pattern {
00058                                                 $rand };
00059                         } else {
00060                                 $output {
00061                                         2 - $i }
00062                                         = " ";
00063                         }
00064                         $dec = (int) ($dec / 2);
00065                         $i++;
00066                 } while ($dec > 0);
00067                 return $output;
00068         }

00168 
00169                         $output = str_replace("0", " ", $output);

00171                 }

00177         function encode($input, $prime) {
00178                 return md5($input . date("H") . $prime);
00179         }
00180 
00186         function generateCode($a, $b, $prime) {
00187                 $code = MathGuard :: encode($a + $b, $prime);
00188                 return $code;
00189         }

00195         function checkResult($mathguard_answer, $mathguard_code, $prime = 37) {
00196 
00197                 //              echo("prime; $prime, $mathguard_answer");
00198                 $result_encoded = MathGuard :: encode($mathguard_answer, $prime);
00199 
00200                 if ($result_encoded == $mathguard_code)
00201                 return true;
00202                 else
00203                 return false;
00204 
00205         }
